summary.span: 表示 控制項中的資料列。

span.span: Represents a row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示中的資料列控制項。The class represents a row in a control. 您可以擷取到的資料列和控制項的集合。You can retrieve rows through the and collections of the control. 不同於、實際包含的所有該資料列中的資料格集合。Unlike a , a physically contains a collection of all of the cells in that row. 您可以透過此集合屬性。You can access this collection through the property. 類別用來存取個別資料格元素，以及調整的外觀和行為的資料列的使用者介面 (UI)，例如高度和資料格的樣式。The class is used to access the individual cell elements, as well as to adjust the appearance and behavior of the row user interface (UI), such as height and cell style. 一般而言，您會想所有資料列或在要共用相同特性的控制項中的最大資料列。Typically, you will want all rows or most rows in the control to share the same characteristics. 若要設定控制項中的所有資料列的儲存格樣式，設定所傳回的物件屬性屬性。To set cell styles for all rows in the control, set the properties of the object returned by the property. 若要設定替代資料列的樣式，使用屬性。To set styles for alternating rows, use the property. 如需有關儲存格樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您也可以使用屬性來定義將用於做為基礎的所有資料列加入至控制項的資料列。You can also use the property to define a row that will be used as a basis for all rows added to the control. 控制項都會共用跨多個資料列盡可能以避免效能的負面影響的物件。The control will share objects across multiple data rows whenever possible to avoid performance penalties. 除非您正在使用大量資料而產生效能問題，您通常可以忽略共用資料列。Unless you are working with large amounts of data and experiencing performance issues, you can typically ignore row sharing. 共用的資料列會由屬性值為-1。A shared row is indicated by an property value of -1. 某些成員類別不能與共用的資料列，但您可以取消資料列共用來存取它透過屬性。Some members of the class cannot be used with shared rows, but you can unshare a row by accessing it through the property. 資料列也會成為以其他方式取消共用。Rows can also become unshared in other ways. 若要存取的資料列，而不取消共用它，請使用方法。To access a row without unsharing it, use the method. 當使用大量的資料，您應該知道如何共用和取消共用，以避免效能的負面影響的資料列。When working with large amounts of data, you should be aware of how rows are shared and unshared to avoid performance penalties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個型別。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:管理 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#209](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewRowDemo.cpp#209)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#209](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewRowDemo.cs#209)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#209](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewrowdemo.vb#209)]

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指出使用者在除非，按一下滑鼠右鍵的資料列時，會顯示快顯功能表控制事件或資料列屬性會覆寫已按下的特定資料格的捷徑功能表。This property indicates the shortcut menu that is displayed when the user right-clicks the row unless the control event or the row property overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked. 當控制項屬性設定或其屬性是`true`，取得的值屬性會引發控制項事件，並傳回的值屬性，指定在事件處理常式。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果沒有事件處理常式，取得的值屬性會傳回先前指定的值或其預設值是`null`。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`. 處理事件時，主要是使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響，設定資料列時多個資料列的值。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the row value for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 變更此屬性會引發事件上擁有，如果有的話。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. 如果共用的目前資料列，使用方法，而不是取得這個屬性的值。If the current row is shared, use the method rather than getting the value of this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，亦即幾乎等同屬性類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, which is nearly identical to the property of the class. 此程式碼範例屬於較大的程式碼範例中所提供的類別。This code example is part of a larger code example provided in the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#130)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#130)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#130)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取直接透過資料列物件的資料繫結物件時，您就不必直接存取資料來源包含的物件。Accessing data-bound objects directly through row objects is useful when you do not have direct access to the data source containing the objects. 當您想要操作到選取的資料列或資料列做為引數傳遞至事件處理常式繫結的物件還有很方便。It is also convenient when you want to manipulate objects bound to selected rows or to rows passed as arguments to event handlers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取商務物件繫結至一個資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a business object bound to a row. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:存取物件的繫結至 Windows Forms DataGridView 資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-objects-bound-to-windows-forms-datagridview-rows.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Access Objects Bound to Windows Forms DataGridView Rows](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-objects-bound-to-windows-forms-datagridview-rows.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格屬性，從其他屬性的型別繼承樣式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 透過指定此資料列中的資料格，樣式屬性覆寫透過指定的樣式， ， ，和屬性，但會透過指定的樣式所覆寫屬性。For cells in this row, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the , , , and properties, but are overridden by the styles specified through the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 取得這個屬性中，當與預設值會在建立屬性已不被存取。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這會造成效能影響。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 可能的話，使用單一設定此屬性的多個資料列。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性在主要用於顯示的控制項。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，以數種方式自訂控制項的視覺外觀，控制項設定了有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性供以內容為基礎的自動調整大小功能控制項來決定資料列的理想高度。This property is used by the content-based automatic sizing feature of the control to determine the ideal height of a row. `rowIndex`值可讓您指定共用的資料列的實際資料列索引。The `rowIndex` value lets you specify the actual row index of a shared row. (共用的資料列有屬性值為-1。)(Shared rows have property values of -1.) A`fixedWidth`的參數值`false`計算導出資料行寬度，以達到理想的儲存格高度與寬度的比例為基礎的資料列高度。A `fixedWidth` parameter value of `false` calculates the row height based on calculated column widths that will achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios. 儲存格的內容分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需有關自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，以判斷新的邊框距離，已調整大小的資料列。The following code example uses the method to determine the new padding for a row that has been resized. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列的外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法使用這個屬性設定為共用的資料列。You cannot use this property with a shared row. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about shared rows, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如果屬性是，使用者將無法手動調整資料列高度。If the property is , the user will not be able to manually adjust the row height. 根據預設，屬性值根據屬性值。By default, the property value is based on the property value. 如果您明確設定要或，不過，則會忽略控制項值。If you explicitly set to or , however, the control value is ignored. 設定至還原值繼承行為。Set to to restore the value-inheritance behavior. 因為還原值繼承屬性永遠不會傳回值，除非資料列尚未加入至控制項。Because restores the value inheritance, the property will never return a value unless the row has not been added to a control. 如果您需要決定是否資料列的屬性值繼承，或已明確地指定檢查其屬性。If you need to determine whether the property value of a row is inherited or has been specified explicitly, check its property. 如果值會包含旗標，不會繼承屬性值。If the value includes the flag, the property value is not inherited. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks `values`參數代表用來填入資料格的值，資料列中的引數數目可變。The `values` parameter represents a variable number of arguments used to populate cell values in the row. 這些值可以傳遞至這個方法，做為多個個別的引數，或做為成員的單一。These values can be passed to this method as multiple, individual arguments or as members of a single . 因為值應該是類型的執行個體，不過，如果您傳遞實值型別值的陣列中 (例如值)，此方法會視為單一物件的陣列，並將它指派給單一儲存格。Because the values are expected to be instances of type , however, if you pass in an array of value-type values (such as values), this method will treat the array as a single object and assign it to a single cell. 若要避免此行為，您必須轉型將實值型別陣列陣列，或在多個值做為多個引數中傳遞。To avoid this behavior, you must cast a value-type array to an array or pass in multiple values as multiple arguments. 如果有多個值在`values`清單比要初始化的儲存格，此方法會忽略額外的值，並傳回`false`。If there are more values in the `values` list than there are cells to be initialized, this method ignores the extra values and returns `false`. 這個方法也會傳回`false`如果任何一個指定的值不能設定。This method also returns `false` if any of the specified values cannot be set. 如果有較少的值多於可用的資料格，剩下不相符的儲存格就會保留其目前的值。If there are fewer values than there are cells, the remaining unmatched cells retain their current values.
